roleset.name: young plants appearing

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Can those seeds germinate * to create a second spring for Taiwan's textile industry?
example.arg: * to create a second spring for Taiwan's textile industry

example.name: with agent
example.text: He germinated peas in a nutritive solution.

roleset.note: Frame by Jena based on ECTB2, VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5, 'sprout'. Member of VNcls . entity_specific_cos-45.5, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2.
